Value source.Title: Value source
Value source.Remark:
Enter any valid Aurora Internal or Windows performance counter for your system in format "Category | Name | Instance".
List of all available Windows counters can be found in Performance Monitor.
All Aurora Internal counters are listed below:
Aurora Internal | Default Network | % Network Total Usage
Aurora Internal | Default Network | Bytes Received/sec
Aurora Internal | Default Network | Bytes Sent/sec
Aurora Internal | Default Network | Bytes Total/sec
Aurora Internal | Default Network | Current Bandwidth
Aurora Internal | GPU | % FanUsage
Aurora Internal | GPU | % Load
Aurora Internal | GPU | Core Clock
Aurora Internal | GPU | FanRpm
Aurora Internal | GPU | Memory Clock
Aurora Internal | GPU | Temperature
Aurora Internal | Memory | % PhysicalMemoryUsed
Aurora Internal | Memory | % VirtualMemoryUsed
Aurora Internal | Memory | AvailablePhysicalMemoryInMiB
Aurora Internal | Memory | AvailableVirtualMemoryInMiB
Aurora Internal | Memory | TotalPhysicalMemoryInMiB
Aurora Internal | Memory | TotalVirtualMemoryInMiB
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | % FanUsage
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | % Load Core
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | % Load Memory Controller
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | % Load Video Engine
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | % Memory Usage
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | Clock Core
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | Clock Memory
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | Clock Shader
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | FanRpm
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | Memory Free
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | Memory Total
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | Memory Used
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | Temperature Board
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | Temperature GPU
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | Temperature Memory
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | Temperature Power Supply
Aurora Internal | System Disk | % Usage

Value expression.Title: Value expression
Value expression.Remark: Math expression that is used to normalize raw value. "x" is the raw value. Normalized value should be in 0-100 range.

Gradient.Title: Gradient
Gradient.Remark:
Gradient that is used for effect. Separate color points with "|".
Optionally set point position with "@" symbol.

Enable Overload Blinking.Title: Enable Overload Blinking
Enable Overload Blinking.Remark: Last gradient color will blink when value reaches overload threshold level

Overload Start Threshold.Title: Overload Start Threshold
Overload Start Threshold.Remark: Blinking start be visible when value reaches this level

Overload Full Threshold.Title: Overload Full Threshold
Overload Full Threshold.Remark: Blinking will be fully visible when value reaches this level

Gradient.Title: Gradient

Gradient that is used for effect. Separate color points with "|".
Optionally set point position with "@" symbol.

Enable Overload Blinking.Title: Enable Overload Blinking
Enable Overload Blinking.Remark: Last gradient color will blink when value reaches overload threshold level

Graph Mode.Title: Graph Mode
Graph Mode.Remark:
Display graph of last ping responses instead of bar representing last one response.
In graph mode animation begins only after ping response (another words a bit later then in normal mode).

Default Host.Title: Default Host
Default Host.Remark: Ping this host when no known apps in foreground.

Per App Hosts.Title: Per App Hosts
Per App Hosts.Remark: Ping special host (i.e. game server) when certain app is in foreground. Separate apps with "|".

Max Ping.Title: Max Ping
Max Ping.Remark: Such pings or higher will fill full bar.

Ping Shadow Width.Title: Ping Shadow Width
Ping Shadow Width.Remark: Width of shadow preceding ping signal

Fail Animation Duration.Title: Fail Animation Duration
Fail Animation Duration.Remark: Duration of failed ping animation in (ms)

Success Animation Duration.Title: Success Animation Duration
Success Animation Duration.Remark: Duration of succeeded ping animation in (ms)

Delay Between Requests.Title: Delay Between Requests
Delay Between Requests.Remark: Minimum delay to make a new request from start of the last request.

Delay After Animation.Title: Delay After Animation
Delay After Animation.Remark: Minimum delay to make a new request from last animation end. (ms)

Bar Gradient.Title: Bar Gradient
Bar Gradient.Remark:
Gradient that is used for effect. Separate color points with "|".
Optionally set point position with "@" symbol.

Fail Animation Gradient.Title: Fail Animation Gradient
Fail Animation Gradient.Remark:
Gradient that is used for animation failed ping. Separate color points with "|".
Optionally set point position with "@" symbol.

Number of Pings in graph mode.Title: Number of Pings in graph mode
Number of Pings in graph mode.Remark: Amount of last pings that will be used to display graph.

Value source.Title: Value source
Value source.Remark:
Enter any valid Aurora Internal or Windows performance counter for your system in format "Category | Name | Instance".
List of all available Windows counters can be found in Performance Monitor.
All Aurora Internal counters are listed below:
Aurora Internal | Default Network | % Network Total Usage
Aurora Internal | Default Network | Bytes Received/sec
Aurora Internal | Default Network | Bytes Sent/sec
Aurora Internal | Default Network | Bytes Total/sec
Aurora Internal | Default Network | Current Bandwidth
Aurora Internal | GPU | % FanUsage
Aurora Internal | GPU | % Load
Aurora Internal | GPU | Core Clock
Aurora Internal | GPU | FanRpm
Aurora Internal | GPU | Memory Clock
Aurora Internal | GPU | Temperature
Aurora Internal | Memory | % PhysicalMemoryUsed
Aurora Internal | Memory | % VirtualMemoryUsed
Aurora Internal | Memory | AvailablePhysicalMemoryInMiB
Aurora Internal | Memory | AvailableVirtualMemoryInMiB
Aurora Internal | Memory | TotalPhysicalMemoryInMiB
Aurora Internal | Memory | TotalVirtualMemoryInMiB
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | % FanUsage
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | % Load Core
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | % Load Memory Controller
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | % Load Video Engine
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | % Memory Usage
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | Clock Core
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | Clock Memory
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | Clock Shader
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | FanRpm
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | Memory Free
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | Memory Total
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | Memory Used
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | Temperature Board
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | Temperature GPU
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | Temperature Memory
Aurora Internal | NvidiaGpu #0 | Temperature Power Supply
Aurora Internal | System Disk | % Usage

Value expression.Title: Value expression
Value expression.Remark: Math expression that is used to normalize raw value. "x" is the raw value. Normalized value should be in 0-100 range.

Gradient.Title: Gradient
Gradient.Remark:
Gradient that is used for effect. Separate color points with "|".
Optionally set point position with "@" symbol.

Enable Overload Blinking.Title: Enable Overload Blinking
Enable Overload Blinking.Remark: Last gradient color will blink when value reaches overload threshold level

Overload Start Threshold.Title: Overload Start Threshold
Overload Start Threshold.Remark: Blinking start be visible when value reaches this level

Overload Full Threshold.Title: Overload Full Threshold
Overload Full Threshold.Remark: Blinking will be fully visible when value reaches this level
